org.nzdis.micro.constants

Class PlatformConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nzdis.micro.constants.PlatformConstants
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MicroBootProperties, MTRuntime

    public abstract class PlatformConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes constants used throughout the micro-agent platform, including the configuration mechanisms.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2012/03/14 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Christopher Frantz

      • PREFIX_AGENT_OUTPUT_WITH_MESSAGE_TYPE

        public static final java.lang.String PREFIX_AGENT_OUTPUT_WITH_MESSAGE_TYPE
        Constant indicating if agent console output should be prefixed (in the first line if multiline output) with message type (e.g. INFO, ERROR) for easier filtering with text-based filtering tools.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
